title: Look at the wonderful custom message I got from riot when they permabanned my friends forum account
body:
http://imgur.com/lzHYpnn

Is this really what you want GD to turn into?

Some %%%%%% version of reddit filled with little kids who circle jerk eachother over the stupidest shit?

GD once used to be great. Riot has officially turned it into a shithole for 14 year olds.
